verbose_text: In turn, the lower NO bioavailability of obese adults may contribute to impaired glucose regulation on account of the important role of NO in pancreatic beta-cell function [XREF_BIBR] and insulin dependent and independent mechanisms of glucose clearance [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NO bioavailability of obese adults may contribute to impaired glucose regulation on account of the important role of NO in pancreatic beta-cell function [ XREF_BIBR ] and insulin dependent and independent mechanisms of glucose
